caption: They like Mexicans to work for them but not to eat there!

1st time......was the best pizza experience in bay ridge..and thats a BIG statement.. 1st of all the eat in environment is very cozy and the staff is beyond friendly and accommodating.. wonderful smells as soon as you step in and the pizza is phenomenal... all fresh ingredients and you can tell.. we went on a rainy day and as a pizza nerd i know that could effect the dough.. but the crust was crispy as can be.. attention to detail , friendly staff, good music, great decor and most importantly THE PIZZA IS 5 STARS... this place is a must visit! We are taking pastries home and the constant traffic of regulars in and out for the pastries tells me i wont be disappointed... we will be back sooner than later.. thanks to the staff at Lombardos!!!
They serve big dishes and for fair pricing. helpful employees. 5 stars from me.

The reviews are what peaked our interest and were without exaggeration... upon entering, the home cooking aromas captivate your olfactory sense with artisanal quality. Our pizza (which we ordered to go) was complimented with fresh Basil set aside for distribution to personal taste. Additionally, the staff was friendly and courteous... will definitely return.
Great food and a very nice ambiance.  The calzones are fresh, huge and the best in NYC.
Great  Pizza

My husband and I had an unplanned Valentine’s Day dinner with our little daughter here. The staff was so amazing and accommodating! The food was also so good my one year old ate everything! Will definitely come back.
Food was delicious and service excellent.
(Translated by Google) Excellent  (Original) Excelente

Worst service we have had in the city  in the 3 years living here. Wait staff was in piss poor condition who would rather stand around the bar than check on their tables. Won't be returning for a WHILE

Place is great. Awesome Artisian pizza, like nothing around here, truly a hidden gem (they just opened) well worth the wait. Best pizza i had in a long time, I been there 3 times this week alone.  They have delivery now, so awesome

We were very excited to try Lombardo’s. Unfortunately our brief experience left us very baffled with the customer service we received. On Wednesday night we called up ahead,around 8:40pm, to ask if there was indoor dining available for a party of 2. We were told that seating was available but we had to leave by 9:30 because everything had to be “sanitized”.  We agreed and said we will be there around 9pm. Upon arriving at exactly 9:05 the host who talked with us on the phone ( Eva was the name I believe) told us that she will NOT be seating us 😳 even though the place closes at 10 and we had no problem with leaving at 9:30 as promised. All we wanted was some pizza. The kicker was that the place was absolutely EMPTY. With all due respect with a host like that, it will be 😕
Amazing pizza,  they follow the protocol very well , take temperature at the entrance.. 😷 And the food is delicious!! The waitress is such a sweetheart 💕 10+ to this place in our neighborhood !!
Great calozone and pizza.
their calzones give me a hard on

Manny, his family, and the entire staff are nothing short of amazing! EVERYTHING we’ve ever ordered was fantastic. Thank you for giving our block amazing food, a great atmosphere, and all of you guys.  “OUR HOME AWAY FROM HOME”

Best pizza I have tried in Brooklyn. At first place I was very skeptic about this place but gave it a try looking at the pictures, and I am so glad I tried. If you are looking for authentic and very delicious Italy pizza this is the place. Very very delicious.
Amazing food and service for really great prices! Will definitely be back!

A beloved local artisan restaurant - we miss dining in because the decor and vibe was a great date spot. We found it because they have gluten-free pizza. Their regular pizza is good - especially with olives. During the pandemic, be sure to order around 5pm or whenever they open on the weekends because their pizza is in high demand.
Best pizza in bay ridge , I’ve been there once and look forward to going back.

Lombardo’s Pizza you stolen a pizz-a my heart. The pizza is Delicious & Fresh. Interior decor clean with outdoor seating & dining. They have a friendly, speedy service she even brought the pizzas right to my car. Supporting our local neighborhood business. We highly recommend Lombardo’s Of BayRidge pizza. #ThatsAmore!!
Best brick oven pizza in the city!
I love their pizza, it’s just a block & a half from me. Very friendly staff too.
Best pizza anywhere
Great atmosphere and music. Freshly made. Please try the signature pizza, The Giancarlo or the Santino. Then stay for dessert. I can't wait to go back. Delicious.
The Giancarlo is the best pizza I've ever had.
Great little spot. Warm and welcoming staff,with excellent pizza. Don't forget to try the calzone,.
Decided to check out Lombardo's for the first time.  The service was great and the pizza and calzones were excellent!  A true gem.  Can't wait to go back.
Loved their vegan pizza, the atmosphere and very friendly staff! Keep up the great job! ❤️❤️❤️
Food is great and the owner is a pizza master! I highly recommend!

This pizza is the real deal. My favorite in Bay Ridge. Vegetarian and vegan options. And the best part is, my picky, doesn’t like to go to restaurants 10 year old, never says no to Lombardo’s. Good stuff.
Pizza and calzones that you will think about for days.  Leo and Joanna are the sweetest owners.  Simply my favorite pizza!
For the vegan options!!!
Great brick oven pizza, cozy environment!
Ate 2 pies that is all.

The pizza is the best I have in years 1/ 2 margarita and Half with honey pepperoni . Honey? That’s what I said to the owner when she suggested it. It was fantastic, and the calzone w/ prosciutto was phenomenal. It’s the best pizza I’ve had in a long long time you . You will not be disappointed in this place , I can’t wait to go back
Amazing Pizza!
Delicious food, great service
Good food but small place you can reach the next table plate
Delicious
Wonderfully authentic Brooklyn Pizza. I've been a chef for 25 years. Very nice job.
Quality ingredients.  One of the best in Brooklyn
Best pizza in this neighborhood
Excellent pizza. Very traditional with a fun twist
Exquisite, mouth watering, vegan pizza!!!
Awesome pizza, cool cozy vibe, excellent service
Amazing pizza great service totally awesome atmosphere
Delicious !
I think it one of the best in New York. Totally fresh and made to order. The whole family loves the place. Can't wait to back again soon.

I’ve walked by many times and was intrigued every time. I finally tried it out! We were seated quickly but it took a while for the waitresses to take our order and give us waters. We were trying to get their (2 waitresses) attention but they seemed quite busy. When one of them noticed us, she asked if we were ready, apologized and took our order. They have a very concise menu and they only take cash. The tax is already included in the price you see on the menu. We ordered the Prosciutto di Parma & Arugula. The pizza was perfection!! It was so, so good. There was enough ingredients on every slice. The bf and I finished the whole pizza (8 slices). I will definitely be back soon!
Picked up a pie yesterday. Cozy and friendly with delicious pizza. Definitely will stop for more
Delicious pizza nice cozy spot

Had a great time here with a couple of friends. The staff was very friendly and not pushy with any of the items on the menu. We ended up ordering a margarita pie with pepperoni and a small calzone. The calzone came first and even though it says on the menu it serves 2 people. That thing was huge!! Pretty sure it serves 3 people and it was so good. The pizza was perfect when it came to us. The crust was crispy and the pepperoni was delicious. Highly recommend this place to try out.
Good food.
Great food. Good service. Great selections and freah ingredients.
Great pizza! Great salad! Great place!! Highly recommended. GO THERE!!!
Some of the best pizza I have ever had and the calzone is out of this world.
Delicious vegan pizza made with follow your heart cheese!!
Pizza is very good, they have a nice wine selection with reasonable prices. Overall a very pleasant experience!
Nice little cosy restaurant with good food.  Pizza was great.

This was a great little fun place that literally had the biggest yummiest salad!! (No carbs..or I would have devoured the brick oven pizza...yum!) The kids loved it as well, fun character night served with pizza, face painting, balloon swords and pics with Leo from Ninja turtles and spider man!!!!

This is the best pizza I have had! The topping combinations are unique and delicious and you can get half and half on one pie. The service is great and it is such a cute cozy place inside. Very traditional old school Italian feel with nice music and even board games. I don’t think enough people know of this place. It is amazing!!

This place is Amazing!!!!! Hands down one of the best pizza/ pizza spots ever. The staff is really nice and friendly. The space is homey and Everything there tastes delicious! From the Salads to their calzone and not to mention their pizza. We had the traditional but we will be back to try all the other pies!  SPECTACULAR job Lombardo’s!

First review ever! Can't believe the terrible customer service here! I drove 15 min in Bay Ridge based off of the reviews. The buckco flipping pies tells the waitress it'll an hour wait cause of a big delivery order. Can't imagine you blow off someone there for a delivery first off. Secondly your business can't handle a big order maybe you shouldn't take it?

Brick walls, brick oven pizza, delicious appetizers, and nutella pizza for dessert add Stephanie to make you feel right at home and couple all of that with Manny's amazing ability with the "dough" and you have a neighborhood place to visit again and again !!!

Perfection! The Italian atmosphere is perfect! The place is located right off of the avenue so you're not distracted by all the other commercial establishments and traffic. It maintains a cozy atmosphere so you can focus on the most important thing, the amazing food. Every piece of food I ate and saw others eat was amazing. It's as if each item you ordered is made with 100% love from a caring family member. The waitresses are super polite and accommodating. I've yet to have a bad experience and as the popularity of this pizzeria grows, I won't mind at all waiting in line to be seated to have any of his pies or calzones. The menu is straight forward with enough options to satisfy anyone. I've even tried pies that I wouldn't normally order but the chef found a way to make everything delicious. I would say the worst part of the night is figuring out what great pie to eat. As an added bonus, whatever I can't finish, I'll reheat the next day and it still tastes great. Lombardo's of Bay Ridge is already a landmark and staple pizzeria shop in a city full of wannabe pizzerias. I challenge anyone to be disappointed with there experience. Advice... get there early and get put on the list ASAP otherwise you'll be waiting. However, it's ALWAYS worth the wait! I met the chef and told him how great everything was and he was very appreciative about all the compliments he was getting from the other customers. He was busy the whole time I was there but took a few moments to talk and make sure we had a great time. I wish I could give it more than 5 stars! Enjoy and bon apetito!

I’ve dined at this place with my mom twice and I have to say that we had a better experience the first time. The food was fine although I found the pizza better the first time around. The service was not great which was very disappointing. I didn’t like something that happened—the waitress that we had(there was only 1 waitress) was cleaning other tables, cleaning the chairs, and even picking up food from the floor then our pizza came out & I saw that she had that same rag that she was cleaning all that stuff with still in her hand while handing down our pizza to our table. I just feel that she should have been more careful with that. And they were not busy that day so go figure.  Another thing—as my mom & I were leaving we said goodnight/goodbye to the waitress & the owners & workers there to everyone really. The only one who said goodnight/goodbye back was the waitress, which I appreciated. Meanwhile, I noticed the owners & employees say goodnight & goodbye to other customers as they left so yes I felt left out. It seems to me that they are only nice to some people and choose to exclude others. My mom and I have been polite both times we’ve visited this place as well. I thought the owners here were nice & friendly people and treated others the way that they want to be treated but I was wrong. Sad but true.
One of the best pies in NYC, service is amazing too
Have to say best pizza in Brooklyn  hands down.
Absolutely delicious!!! Quiet casual and yummy. Crunchy krispy crust and really great flavor. Salads were even awesome. Coming back for sure!!! Great job.
Today was my first time here and I'll definitely  be back. The dough, sauce and toppings were l great. The staff was friendly and helpful. Amazing!

Really enjoyed myself!  This was my first time, love the dough and sauce.  It's great that they also have vegan options, we had the spinach salad and the vegan pizza with mushrooms and vegan pepperoni, it was delicious!  Staff was friendly and helpful.  No kitchen here, so the menu is pizza and salad! Fresh, delicious and perfect!

We accidentally found this place today and thank God we did. Jackpot!  Pizza is out of this world! Top quality! Sauce is fresh and flavor is amazing! Perfect menu. Very homey and cozy atmosphere! Super friendly staff. Manny is the Man! Thank you!

Excellent neighborhood restaurant serving some really good pizza. Their service is also great,  they are very attentive and make you feel at home. Prices are fine, the quality of the ingredients is high and you can taste it on every bite. They don't serve alcohol yet, so they have BYOB which is a great choice if you want to bring your own wine or beers or anything else to drink, other than that, they serve soft drinks and water. Very nice decor and clean, the ambiance is good for a date or for a family dinner or for just anytime you want pizza.
Excellent eggplant caponata and of course the pizza - the photo says it all - need I say more? Cute, cozy place and attentive service. Overall, a wonderful spot that I keep going back to for more!

Really nice place, the food and service were great. Family friendly . The pies you can tell are made with top quality products. Had a nice meal with my girl friend.Took a pie home for my son. Excellent. He loved it too.
Good food. Probably needs a little more variety and to offer delivery. Pizzas are big and they're generous with the toppings. Needs reservations on the weekend. Give this place a try.
Excellent pizza and calzone!

If I could give this place 10 stars I’d do it in a heartbeat. Nothing less than great, great ambience and fantastic staff. Pizza done right there and then. Some of the finest in Brooklyn. Love it. Just get in here and be ready to stuff your face!!!

The pizza is honestly the best I've had around here. The crust is crispy, light and fluffy all at the same time. The calzone is amazing. You must try it. It's not your typical calzone crust and the ricotta cheese is homemade! Absolutely delicious!
Delicious!!

I know this family for many years; even had the pleasure  to work with them at Elegante Pastry Shop. Till this day I still stay in contact and treat them like family. This pizza is by the best I ever tasted in my life. One slice isn’t enough; a pie yes lol !! Definitely worth the travel; see you soon !!!
Excellent pizza!

Great family spot. Quiet. On a side block. Right down the block from my house. Unfortunately I had to go dairy free. Luckily their vegan pizza is amazing. Looking forward to bringing the family there.
Fantastic pizza and the restaurant has a very nice, homey feel. Super nice staff.

Wonderful new restaurant with a family-friendly atmosphere, attentive and charming staff, and amazing brick oven pizza! We had the quattro stagioni pizza. The topping flavors were beautifully balanced and delicious and the crust was amazing--crispy and chewy. Finished with the Nutella pie we had heard about and it was perfect! Strawberries, drizzled caramel, and whipped cream! We can't wait to go back!
